attributes.review:
App made phone glitch.

attributes.title: Glitches

attributes.review: the functionality of this app is very poor regardless of person opinion on trump. it has poor response to tapping something, takes a long time to load compared to others, and overall looks like a five year old made it. i wouldn’t recommend for anyone who does or doesn’t support trump.
attributes.title: glitchy and unproffessional.
